headline: Is Digital Realty (DLR) Pricing Reflect Its Role In Data Center Infrastructure?
summary: If you are wondering whether Digital Realty Trust's current share price lines up with its underlying worth, this article will walk through what the numbers are really saying about value. The stock last closed at US$159.00, with returns of 3.6% over 30 days, 2.6% year to date, a 10.2% decline over 1 year, 64.4% over 3 years, and 26.7% over 5 years. Taken together, these figures give you a mixed picture of recent momentum and risk sentiment. Recent coverage around Digital Realty Trust has...
